import { memo } from 'react' import './MoreInformationTour.scss' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/MoreInformationTour' import { BsTrash } from 'react-icons/bs' import { TbCameraPlus } from 'react-icons/tb' import ReactQuill from 'react-quill' import Select from 'react-select'; import 'react-quill/dist/quill.bubble.css' function MoreInformationTour({ languageSelected, tour, setTour }) { const languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) const modules = { toolbar: [ ['bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strike'], ['blockquote', 'code-block'], [{ 'header': 1 }, { 'header': 2 }], [{ 'list': 'ordered' }, { 'list': 'bullet' }], [{ 'script': 'sub' }, { 'script': 'super' }], [{ 'indent': '-1' }, { 'indent': '+1' }], [{ 'direction': 'rtl' }], [{ 'size': ['small', false, 'large', 'huge'] }], [{ 'header': [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, false] }], [{ 'color': [] }, { 'background': [] }], [{ 'font': [] }], [{ 'align': [] }], ['clean'], ] } const formats = [ 'header', 'font', 'background', 'color', 'code', 'size', 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strike', 'blockquote', 'list', 'bullet', 'indent', 'script', 'align', 'direction', 'link', 'image', 'code-block', 'formula', 'video' ] const handleAddImage = ((value) => { let files = [...tour.images]; for (let i = 0; i < value.length; i++) { files.push(value[i]) } setTour({ ...tour, images: files }); }) const handleDeleteImage = ((index) => { let files = []; for (let i = 0; i < tour.images.length; i++) { if (i !== index) { files.push(tour.images[i]) } } setTour({ ...tour, images: files }); }) return (
{tour.images.map((image, index) => (
handleDeleteImage(index)}>
))}
right2
) } export default memo(MoreInformationTour)
